dcterms:description: The Fbhm dataset contains 10,000 memes collected from Getty images and are semi-artificially annotated using benign confounders. It consists of five varieties of memes, including multimodal hate, unimodal hate, benign image and text confounders, and random not-hateful examples.
dcterms:title: Fbhm

dcterms:creator: Shraman Pramanick
Dimitar Dimitrov
Rituparna Mukherjee
Shivam Sharma
Md. Shad Akhtar
Preslav Nakov
Tanmoy Chakraborty
dcterms:description: The HarMeme dataset contains COVID-related memes posted on US social media. It includes original memes with associated textual content generated from Google Vision API, categorized into hateful and non-hateful memes.
dcterms:title: HarMeme

dcterms:creator: Elisabetta Fersini
Francesca Gasparini
Giulia Rizzi
Aurora Saibene
Berta Chulvi
Paolo Rosso
Alyssa Lees
Jeffrey Sorensen
dcterms:description: The Mami dataset focuses on identifying misogynistic memes, where memes are labeled as either misogynist or non-misogynist. The dataset includes memes collected from social media that pertain to threads with women as subjects or antifeminist content.
dcterms:title: Mami
